text: E'ina hu'negu Israeli mopafima me'nea ranra agonaramine, neone agonaramine, tinkrahotamine, aguporaminkura amanage hunka kasnampa kea huo, Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hie, Ko, ruga'a mopafi vahe'mo'zama huhaviza huneramante'za knazama tamigeta tamagazegu'ma hu'naza zantera, tusi narimpa ahezmantegahue.
